channel.title: How do i keep sever up
channel.description: i want to keep it online all the time

item.title: How do i keep sever up
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Don’t waste money on VPS yet since your clearly having issues, DID YOU PORTFOWARD? Check a server setup TUT.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i keep sever up

item.title: How do i keep sever up
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:6, topic:324115”][quote author=Owned_Pl0xs link=topic=420519.msg3088994#msg3088994 date=1262736932]

Buy a cheap vps, from either www.opticVPS.com or www.vpsland.com. You can also leave your RunServer up but usually it crashes during the night.

That’s if you’re using a shitty source such as Deltascape, which you probably are yourself.
[/quote]
You confused me there im using a deltabased source and im using a vps, will it crash during the night? ah snap…[/quote]

You have a slim chance of it crashing on a good vps.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i keep sever up
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Listen to Scape-JAVA, theres no point in keeping runserver up unless your computer is fucking amazing, otherwise it will just crash when you go to bed. You should get VPS if you are actually serious about RSPS, and want your server to go somewhere in the future.

Read full topic
